mapper.insert: insert into user (openid, name, phone, sex, id_number, avatar, create_time) values (#{openid}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{avatar}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE date_series AS ( SELECT #{begin} AS date UNION ALL SELECT date + INTERVAL 1 DAY FROM date_series WHERE date <= #{end} ) SELECT DATE(date_series.date) AS date, COUNT(u.id) AS count FROM date_series LEFT JOIN user u ON DATE(u.create_time) = date_series.date GROUP BY date_series.date ORDER BY date_series.date
